WorkItem.Description: Is there a plan for silverlight support?

Comments.Message: lots of NAudio simply won't work on silverlight as it wraps unmanaged APIs. However, I would like to release an assembly in the future that makes the reusable bits available for Silverlight.
Agreed, there are several useable bits within NAudio - MP3Frame for example.  I use a very similar class to parse out mp3 samples while streaming on the Silverlight client.
